message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this incredible product from me. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering its exceptional quality and rarity.
I'm interested in the product, but $850000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be comfortable with the price.
